name: web3-provider-proxy
description: A template for kick starting a Cloudflare Workers project

scripts.publish-all: wrangler publish --env ethereum-mainnet && wrangler publish --env goerli && wrangler publish --env rinkeby && wrangler publish --env optimism-mainnet && wrangler publish --env optimism-kovan && wrangler publish --env optimism-goerli && wrangler publish --env polygon-mainnet && wrangler publish --env polygon-mumbai && wrangler publish --env avalanche-mainnet && wrangler publish --env avalanche-fuji
